showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:35}); // {Barret}
“Not only {Aeris}…”{PAUSE}“Holy is the prayer of AVALANCHE…

“Not only {Aeris}…”{PAUSE}“Holy is the prayer of AVALANCHE…

showWindowWithDialog({window:3, dialog:13}); // {Tifa}
“{Cloud}…
“{Cloud}…

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:36}); // {Tifa}
“{Aeris} is here…
everyone is here…
{Cloud} is here with us!”{PAUSE}“There's still a lot for us to do…
I'm not giving up!!”

everyone is here…

ops.js:
showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:37}); // {Red XIII}
“I'm going to see it through to the end.
For our future…
And that of the Planet…{PAUSE}“I understand now, Grandpa.
This is my mission!”{PAUSE}“I won't let the Lifestream…
or the Planet wither away!!”

to do with my life!”

ops.js:
showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:40}); // {Yuffie}
“Maybe…maybe I shouldn't have come…”{PAUSE}“I don't need…Materia……any…”{PAUSE}“Nope, I still want it!!
This an' that an' everything…MINE!
And I'm never gonna give any up!!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:39}); // {Cait Sith}
“We noticed a little late the
trouble we were getting in…”{PAUSE}“But, there's still time…
We can still get out of it!
Even if we can't get EVERYTHING
back to normal!”{PAUSE}“We should be able to protect
what's most important!!”

ops.js: fade({r:0, g:0, b:0, speed:250, type:2, adjust:0});

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:45}); // {Red XIII}
“…No way we're gonna lose!!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:45}); // {Red XIII}
“…No way we're gonna lose!!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:45}); // {Red XIII}
“…No way we're gonna lose!!”

dialogStrings:
{Cid}
“My…my body…
I can't control my body…
Uuugh!?”

{Red XIII}
“My front legs…my hind legs…
my tail's about to rip off!!”

{Cait Sith}
“This is definitely not good…
He's way outta our league…”

{Yuffie}
“I, I don't know if I can…go on.”

{Cloud}
“…Holy…Holy…
is there…”{PAUSE}“Holy Materia is shining…{OK}
{Aeris}'s prayer is shining!”

{Cloud}
“It's not over yet…
This isn't the end yet!!”

{Cloud}
“{Aeris}'s memories…
Our memories…”{PAUSE}“We came…to tell you…our memories…
Come Planet! Show us your answer!”

“And Sephiroth!!
To the settling of everything!!”

{Barret}
“Not only {Aeris}…”{PAUSE}“Holy is the prayer of AVALANCHE…
Of Marlene and Dyne…
And everyone on the Planet!”

{Tifa}
“{Aeris} is here…
everyone is here…
{Cloud} is here with us!”{PAUSE}“There's still a lot for us to do…
I'm not giving up!!”

{Red XIII}
“I'm going to see it through to the end.
For our future…
And that of the Planet…{PAUSE}“I understand now, Grandpa.
This is my mission!”{PAUSE}“I won't let the Lifestream…
or the Planet wither away!!”

{Cid}
“Hoo-ok!
I can't be foolin' around
in this hell hole…”{PAUSE}“I still have lots of stuff
to do with my life!”

{Cait Sith}
“We noticed a little late the
trouble we were getting in…”{PAUSE}“But, there's still time…
We can still get out of it!
Even if we can't get EVERYTHING
back to normal!”{PAUSE}“We should be able to protect
what's most important!!”

{Yuffie}
“Maybe…maybe I shouldn't have come…”{PAUSE}“I don't need…Materia……any…”{PAUSE}“Nope, I still want it!!
This an' that an' everything…MINE!
And I'm never gonna give any up!!”

{Vincent}
“I was frozen in time…
But now I feel as though my time
is finally beginning!”{PAUSE}“Sephiroth, now it's your time to
sleep for the ages!!”

akao.name: nointro
akao.description: Those Chosen By The Planet (no intro)
